Serialized Form

  • Package suncertify

    • Class suncertify.ConfigurationDialog extends javax.swing.JDialog implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • config

          Configuration config
          The Configuration object that this dialog will allow to be edited.

        • keys

          java.lang.String[] keys
          The keys corresponding to the paramaters of the Configuration object that we want to edit.

        • valueFields

          javax.swing.JTextField[] valueFields
          Array of JTextFields to be used for editing each value.

        • okButton

          javax.swing.JButton okButton
          The Ok button.

        • confirmed

          boolean confirmed
          Flag indicating whether the user confirmed the entered values or hit cancel.

  • Package suncertify.client

    • Class suncertify.client.BookingDialog extends javax.swing.JDialog implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • db

          BookingDB db
          BookingDB object used for data access.

        • recNo

          int recNo
          The number of the record currently being booked.

        • record

          java.lang.String[] record
          The data fields of the record being booked.

        • cookie

          long cookie
          The lock cookie of the record being booked.

        • ownerField

          javax.swing.JTextField ownerField
          The text field used to set the owner of the booking.

    • Class suncertify.client.BookingTableModel extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • db

          BookingDB db
          BookingDB object used for data access.

        • fieldNames

          java.lang.String[] fieldNames
          The column headings for the TableModel.

        • numCols

          int numCols
          The number of columns in the Table.

        • records

          int[] records
          Array storing the record numbers the rows of the table correspond to.
